eng: Hello! Is there a table for two?
tu: namaskara! Radd janank kullere table unde

eng: Can we sit near the window, please?
tu: yenkleg window da kaithal kulloli yaa, please?

eng: Do you have a non-AC section?
Is this restaurant vegetarian or non-vegetarian?
can we see the menu please?
Do you serve seafood here?
Is it self-service or table service?
tu: mulpa namane order malpoda ath nikul order kenare barpara

eng: What time do you close?
Is this seat taken?
Can you please clean the table?
What do you recommend that’s local or traditional?
tu: ov yedde undu local ah ath traditinal ah?

eng: Do you have any Tulu-style dishes?
tu: ovla tu style da adige unde?

eng: What is today’s special?
I’d like to try something spicy but not too hot.
tu: yan khara thinre try malpuve anda beccha borcchii

eng: Can we get two plates of fish curry and rice?
tu: yenkleg radd plate meen da kajipu la nuppu la korpara?

eng: Is this dish made with coconut?
tu: undu tharai rdh mandhina adige naa?

eng: Does this contain meat or eggs?
Can you make it less spicy, please?
Can I have it packed instead of served?
tu: yenk unden serve malporchi pack malthudh korpara?

eng: Do you serve idli, dosa, or neer dosa in the morning?
tu: nikul kande idli, dosa, ejjinda neer dosa malth korpara?

eng: Do you have fresh juice or tender coconut water?
tu: ereda juice ejjinda bonda da neer unde?

eng: Can I get black coffee instead of milk coffee?
tu: ynk coffee da badal kanna coffee kanpara?

eng: Is the water filtered or bottled?
tu: undu neer filter da na bottle da na?

eng: One cup of tea without sugar, please
Do you have snacks like banana chips or goli baje?
tu: nikleda parndh da chips ejjinda goli baje danchina thinre dala unda?

eng: What exactly is kori rotti?
Is this dish sweet or spicy?
How big is the portion?
Can you explain what’s in this curry?
tu: undu kajipu du dada undu panoli yaa?

eng: Do you have vegetarian options?
Everything tastes delicious!
The food is too spicy for me—can I get some curd?
tu: vanas masth khara athund yenk chur mosaru kanapara?

eng: Can we get some extra chutney?
Can you bring some more water, please?
Excuse me, can we have spoons and napkins?
Can I have the bill, please?
Do you accept cards or only cash?
tu: mulpa card dethonvara ath kali cash ah?

eng: Can I pay through UPI or QR code?
tu: UPI ejjinda QR code rdh kaas padoli ahh?

eng: Please give me a printed bill
Keep the change, thank you.
The food was amazing, thank you!
We really enjoyed your hospitality
tu: niklena sudarike masth kushi andd yenkleg

eng: Can we take a photo here?
Is it okay if we give a small tip?
tu: onjji yelya tip korpa bejar ejjathee?

eng: We’ll definitely visit again.
Can you suggest a good place nearby for dessert?
tu: ice-cream thinre aapina kaithal d onjji yedde jaga panpara?

eng: Where can we get local sweets like halwa or patrode?
tu: halwa ejjinda pathrode danchina sweet olp thikku?

Bye! Have a nice day!

tu: atta d vanas malpere jaga unde?

eng: Do you have buffet?
What time does the buffet start?
Is breakfast available?
What time do you serve breakfast?
tu: yeth ganteg cha thindi korpini nikul?

eng: Do you serve lunch now?
Do you serve dinner now?
Do you have snacks?

One coffee please.

Do you serve North Indian meals?

tu: undu dish n yenne padandhe malpoli ya?

eng: Do you have a low-spice version of this?
tu: nikleda undu kammi khara d unde?

eng: Is this dish sour or sweet?
tu: undu dish kaipe na cheepe na?

eng: Can I have extra lemon slices?
Can you remove the seeds from the chillies?
tu: munchi d eppuna beeja deppoli ya?

eng: Is this meal available as a combo?
tu: undu vanas combo da leka thikkunde?

eng: Does this dish come with starters?
tu: undu dish starters da ottige barpunde?

eng: Can we order starters first and decide the main later?
tu: yenkul suruk starter dethondh main boka order malpoli ya?

eng: Do you offer a sampler platter?
Does this thali include refills?
tu: undu thali g kudora padre bodithnda kenoli ya?

eng: Can you refill the sambar and chutney?
tu: sambar boka chutney kuda ora  korpara?

eng: Is the water filtered or bottled?
tu: undu neer filter da na bottle da na?

eng: Do you offer mineral water for drinking?
Can you refill the water jug?
tu: neer da jug kuda fill malpoli ya?

eng: Can this dish be served without onions?
tu: undu dish n neerulli padandhe balasuvara?

eng: Can you add extra coriander leaves?
tu: ereg aik extra kottambari soppu padoli ya?

eng: Can you make it without garlic?
tu: ereg aven belluli padandhe malpoli ya?

eng: Is the yogurt homemade or packaged?
tu: undu yogurt ellad maldhina na ath pack da na?

eng: Can I get cold curd instead of room temperature?
tu: yenk chappe kojapu rdh cold kojapu korle?

eng: Can I get extra curd with the meal?
tu: yenk extra kojapu thikkuva meal da ottige?

eng: Do you serve buttermilk with the meal?
tu: nikul majjige la korpara vanas da ottige?

eng: Can you give sweet buttermilk instead of salted?
tu: yenk cheepeda majjige koroli ya khara da badal?

eng: Do you have any millet-based dishes?
tu: nikleda raagi da ovula dish unde?

eng: Do you use organic ingredients?
Is your paneer fresh and soft?
tu: niklena paneer fresh boka soft unde?

eng: Can I get an extra slice of lime?
tu: yenk limbe puli da kudonjji thundu thikkuva?

eng: Is there a kids-friendly portion of this meal?
Do you store leftovers safely if we step out briefly?
tu: niukl oridhina deth deepara nama mini pidai poyada?

eng: Can we order half a portion of this dish?
tu: undu dish da arda portion order malpoli ya?

eng: Can we combine two half portions?
tu: radd arda portion ottige malpoli ya?

eng: Is there a lighter portion option?
Can you give freshly chopped onions?
tu: fresh adh cut maldhina neerulli korpara?

eng: Can you give the dessert warm instead of cold?
tu: cold da badal warm dessert koroli ya?

eng: Do you serve hot jalebi or chilled?
tu: nikul beccha jalebi korpara ath chappe na?

eng: Can you sprinkle some cinnamon on top?
Can I get plain rice instead of flavored rice?
tu: yenk flavour da nuppu dh plain nuppu thikkuva

eng: Is the biryani cooked?
Do you have clay-pot cooked dishes?
tu: nikleda mann da bajan d maldhina dish unde?

eng: Is your coffee filter-brewed?
Do you serve jaggery coffee?
Can you adjust the sweetness in the juice?
tu: ereg juice d cheepe n adjust malpoli ya?

eng: Can you add extra ice cubes?
tu: ereg extra ice cubes padoli ya?

eng: Do you have seasonal fruit juices?
tu: ereda seasona da fruit juices unde?

eng: Do you serve fresh tender coconut water?
tu: niul fresh bonda da neer korpara?

eng: Is this dish authentic to this region?
tu: undu dish authentic adh unde undu jaaga g?

eng: Do you have a Tulu-style traditional meal?
tu: nikleda tu style da traditional vanas unde?

eng: Does this dish contain tamarind or kokum?
Can you serve the food in traditional style plates?
tu: nikul traditional style da plate d vanas balasuna?

eng: Do you offer a tasting menu for first-time visitors?
tu: first time barpinakleg taste pndh menu korpara?

eng: Can I have a light snack while waiting for my meal?
tu: yenna vanas g kapuna yenk yelya thinre thinoli ya?

eng: Is there a waiting list I should add my name to?
tu: waiting list unde yan yenna pudar la serpavoda?

eng: Can you notify me when a table is free?
Do you take table reservations for weekends?
Can I book a private dining area?
tu: yan private adh vanas malpere jaga book malpoli ya?

eng: Do you have outdoor seating available?
Is the outdoor seating covered in case it rains?
tu: onjji vele barsa bathnda pidai d cover maldhara?

eng: Can I sit near the window?
tu: yenk kandi da kaithal kulloli ya?

eng: Is there a place to store my bags safely?
tu: yenna bags pura jagrathe d deeyare jaga unde?

eng: Do you provide baby chairs?
Do you have a separate menu for kids?
Can I have mashed food for my baby?
tu: yenk nakke maldhina nuppu thikkuva yenna bhaleg korre?

eng: Is there a play area for children?
Can you reduce the portion size for this dish?
tu: undu dish da portion size kammi malpuvara?

eng: Is there a sharing plate charge?
tu: share malthina plate g kaas padvara?

eng: Do you provide free drinking water?
tu: nikul free g parpina neer korpara?

eng: Can I get a jug of warm water?
tu: yenk jug d chappe neer thikkuva?

eng: Is your ice made from purified water?
tu: erna ice yedde neer rdh  maldhina na?

eng: Can this dish be prepared without frying?
tu: undu dush n fry malpandhe malpere apunde?

eng: Is there an option to grill instead?
Can you serve me half rice and half roti?
tu: yenk arda nuppu arda roti korpara?

eng: Do you offer millet rotis?
Do you make fresh chapati or pre-cooked ones?
tu: nikul fresh chapati malpuna ath dumbe malth deedh eppuvara

eng: Can I order extra gravy without extra charge?
tu: extra gasi extra kaas ejjandge order malpoli ya?

eng: Do you serve steamed vegetables without seasoning?
Can you add extra ghee on top?
tu: extra thuppa mith d padoli ya?

eng: Can you prepare this dish with coconut oil?
tu: tharai da yenne pardh undu du=ish malpoli ya?

eng: Is jaggery water available here?
Do you serve kokum drink?
Can you prepare fresh lime soda without sugar?
tu: sakkare padandhe fresh limbe da soda malpuvara?

eng: Do you serve tender coconut pudding?
Can I get a dessert without nuts?
Can I order a hot dessert instead of cold?
tu: cold da badal beccha dessert thikkuva?

eng: Can we get freshly cut fruits instead of sweets?
tu: sweet da badal fresh adh cut maldhina fruits thikkuvaa?

eng: Do you serve dairy-free milk options?
Is this lassi sweet or salted?
tu: undu lassi cheepe unda uppu unda?

eng: Can you make the lassi without butter on top?
tu: benne mith d padandhe lassi malpuvara

eng: Do you serve flavored curd rice?
Can I get pickle without oil?
Can we get a smaller serving for tasting?
Do you offer daily meal subscription service?
tu: dinala vanas malpre apileka subscription thikkunde?

eng: Can I take a monthly meal plan?
Do you give food in tiffins if we bring them?
tu: yenkul butthi kanthada ait katdh korpara?

eng: Can you pack this separately for takeaway?
Can you label the packed containers?
Can you provide extra cutlery with the parcel?
tu: parcel da ottuggu extra cut malpuna bisati korpara?

eng: Is cash back available on digital payments?
tu: mobile d pay malthunda chasback thikkunde?

eng: Can I round off the bill and donate the balance?
tu: bill n round off malpulee bka oridhina kaas dhaana malpoli ya?

eng: Do you have a feedback form?
